channel.title: Cant attack someone with same cape
channel.description:
I know this is a very simple code and i am sorry for asking i just forgot how to do it...
How do you make it so that if someone in certain coords have the same cape as you can not be attacked by you...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2009, 12:25:28 pm[/size][hr]Help pleasE?
